plot: When a priceless lyre is stolen from a museum Sam interrogates each suspect until the bizarre truth is revealed. What is initially seen as a routine inquiry soon turns into a twist of psychological unknowns.
title: Lyre Liar
plot_es: When a priceless lyre is stolen from a museum Sam interrogates each suspect until the bizarre truth is revealed. What is initially seen as a routine inquiry soon turns into a twist of psychological unknowns.
plot_en: When a priceless lyre is stolen from a museum Sam interrogates each suspect until the bizarre truth is revealed. What is initially seen as a routine inquiry soon turns into a twist of psychological unknowns.
